description:
A lightweight, versatile mid-layer, the Delta jacket fits the bill for a wide range of active pursuits. It's made from a soft and comfortable Polartec® fleece that wicks moisture and insulates, with a slightly trimmer fit to layer well without hindering dynamic movements. Use it as a mid-layer on cold days or as a warm outer layer for high-output activities like cross country skiing or winter running.

  • Polartec® Power Dry® fleece is moisture-wicking, breathable and soft against the skin
  • Gusseted underarms and articulated patterning allow freedom of movement
  • Laminated zippered chest pocket carries ID and other small valuables
  • Thumbholes help keep sleeves in place for easy layering
  • Subtle drop hem
  • Trim fit is close-to-the-body but not restrictive
name: Arc'teryx Delta Jacket - Men's
